readme_content: # Hello! 👋 I am Franco Nicolás Bottini, a passionate Computer Engineering student about to finish my degree with a solid academic background and experience in the conceptualization and development of technological solutions. From an early age, I immersed myself in this fascinating universe, building a wide range of projects that span personal, professional and academic aspects. ## Portfolio https://github.com/francobottini99/portfolio ## Contacto [![Linkedin](https://img.shields.io/badge/-LinkedIn-blue?style=flat&logo=Linkedin&logoColor=white)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/franco-bottini-b727b2261) [![Gmail](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Gmail-c14438?style=flat&logo=Gmail&logoColor=white)](mailto:bottinifranco99@gmail.com)
